Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
When built, Banners of Protection will help your colony militia in tactical combat.

An Oathbound specialist center, where colonists can be trained and work as Chroniclers. The structure can later be upgraded after annexing Residential Exploitation sectors to the colony.[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]Basic:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Basic} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Basic}.[/bullet][bullet][darkgrey]Fine:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Fine} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Fine}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][bullet][darkgrey]Immaculate:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Immaculate} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Immaculate}.[br/]Whenever the Lord of the colony [firecol](3 [turn/] adjustment)[/firecol] wins a battle, this colony generates {Immaculate_BonusEventIncome}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][/bulletlist]

An Oathbound specialist center, where colonists can be trained and work as Chroniclers. The structure can later be upgraded after annexing Residential Exploitation sectors to the colony.[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][darkgrey]Basic:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Basic} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Basic}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][bullet]Fine:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Fine} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Fine}.[/bullet][bullet][darkgrey]Immaculate:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Immaculate} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Immaculate}.[br/]Whenever the Lord of the colony [firecol](3 [turn/] adjustment)[/firecol] wins a battle, this colony generates {Immaculate_BonusEventIncome}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][/bulletlist]

A fully upgraded Oathbound specialist center, where colonists can be trained and work as Chroniclers.[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][darkgrey]Basic:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Basic} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Basic}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][bullet][darkgrey]Fine:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Fine} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Fine}.[/darkgrey][/bullet][bullet]Immaculate:[br/]{NumSlotsIncrease_Immaculate} Chronicler Slots.[br/][population/] in Chronicler Slots generate {ChroniclerIncome_Immaculate}.[br/]Whenever the Lord of the colony [firecol](3 [turn/] adjustment)[/firecol] wins a battle, this colony generates {Immaculate_BonusEventIncome}.[/bullet][/bulletlist]
A special slot for population, unlocked by a special buildings
Description of income types. Is inserted in a tooltip explaining the auto colonist assign behavior.

When a hero with a Colony Lord Bonus hero skill is linked to this colony, then the colony will still receive {throneBonus}% of the Hero In Domain bonus, even when the hero is outside of the colony's domain.
A Colony Lord Bonus is a type of Hero Skill listed in Oathbound_HeroSkills.xml
